title: American Idol or The Voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Idol, only because it’s marginally more about the CONTESTANTS and not the JUDGES, although both shows emphasize the judges too much. I pretty much zoom past any of the sob stories they all like to tell and just watch the performances. Maybe a bit of the judges’ input. I hate when The Voice has “Battle rounds” and put two singers up against each other. Most of the time, I don’t get to truly hear enough from either one to judge who “won.” Then, it’s all about the judges arguing about who gets to be their coach. Very boring. The Voice also cuts away from the performer too much during their performance to show shots of the audience and judges. I don’t care about them, it’s about the performance.
